amendment.description: Amendment sought to advance assessments of student achievement and instructional practices, effective teacher preparation and continuing professional development, education administration, and international comparisons. Amendment also sought to support development of a national research strategy to ensure that students, particularly at risk students, have effective teachers and are being prepared for the future.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 35 printed in part B of House Report 114-29 to advance assessments of student achievement and instructional practices, effective teacher preparation and continuing professional development, education administration, and international comparisons. The amendment supports development of a national research strategy to ensure that students, particularly at risk students, have effective teachers and are being prepared for the future.
